example.name: ornament-trill
example.description: Demonstration of how to encode trills with and without wavy lines after them. Also demonstration of how to encode accidental for upper neighboring tone on trill mark. Example from Joseph Haydn's keyboard sonata in D major, Hoboken XVI:33 (Wiener Urtex no. 34), mvmt. 1.

file.name: trill.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: trill.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
